alert.note: Alert for Daviess; Henderson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 19 at 10:05AM EST until February 24 at 2:52PM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Kentucky... Ohio River at Newburgh Dam. .Due to recent heavy rain, the Ohio River is expected to continue to rise, reaching minor flood stage at Newburgh Dam Monday morning, and cresting at 41.6 feet Wednesday evening. For the Ohio River...including Newburgh Dam...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING TO EARLY FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at Newburgh Dam. * WHEN...From Monday morning to early Friday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CST Sunday the stage was 34.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow morning to a crest of 41.6 feet Wednesday evening. It will then fall below flood stage Friday morning. - Flood stage is 38.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
